title: Verseify
description: Verseify is a MERN+Next.js blog app with PWA, payments, auth, likes, comments & push notifications.
keyFeatures: Built fullstack Blog app, Full-featured platform with profiles, likes, comments & AI-assisted writing
Enabled secure payments system for subscriptions via Razorpay
Added full-text search using MongoDB Atlas & PWA features for offline access
Optimized PWA webapp using service worker caching
